action.description: The committee on TRN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Kila, Grandinetti, Evslin, Miyake, Muraoka, Pierick; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran, Kitagawa, La Chica.
